answers.answer: Hi,How are you?Your symptoms of burning feet rapidly progressing are most likely due to peripheral neuropathy which can be due to diabetes or due to nutritional deficiency like B12 deficiency.You can take gabapentin, but please do so under medical supervision. Take care!

question: it started from burning feet and progressed till knees walking ability is affected. i'am 78 yrs old woman in india. my weight is 58 kgs. i'm not able to lift my legs. i'm taking methycobal 500 mg. please suggest if i can use gabaneuron?
title: burning sensation in legs
